long_description: Measuring 78 x 30 x 6 in., the TravelChair SleepRite Cot is wider, longer and higher than other cots that weigh less than 5 lbs., so you can sleep more comfortably on your camping trips. SleepRite Cot weighs 4 lbs. 14 oz., making it easy to transport to the campground. Features shock-corded poles that make assembly a cinch, and there are no small parts to lose while you put it together. 600-denier ripstop polyester and aluminum frame support up to 300 lbs. TravelChair SleepRite Cot collapses down to 10 x 7.5 x 6 in. and fits in the included carry bag.
short_description: Measuring 78 x 30 x 6 in., the TravelChair SleepRite Cot is wider, longer and higher than other cots that weigh less than 5 lbs., so you can sleep more comfortably on your camping trips.
